title: Hamilton Grange National Memorial: Donate
body: Donate       If you would like to make a monetary contribution to Hamilton Grange National Memorial, we can accept checks or money orders made payable to the "National Park Service" at the address below. The park will deposit these funds in the "general" donation account, which typically funds educational and historical interpretation programs at the park.  Hamilton Grange National Memorial C/O Manhattan Sites ATTN: Superintendent 26 Wall Street New York, NY 10005  If you have items related to Alexander Hamilton and would like to donate them to the park, please contact us at the address above, as well.
